package.name: cartesian_controllers
package.description:
Task-space Cartesian control for UR5e and Franka Emika Panda manipulators.
Features: - Jacobian pseudoinverse control with SVD - Damped Least Squares for singularity robustness - Joint rate limiting (< 1.5 rad/s) - Nullspace posture control for 7-DOF robots - Numerical IK solver (95% convergence in < 20 iterations) - 2-3 mm RMS tracking error
